graphql.query:
query {
  order(orderNumber: "ORD-001") {
    id
    orderNumber
    status
    orderType
    subtotal
    taxAmount
    shippingFee
    totalAmount
    createdAt
    customerName
    customerEmail
    customerPhone
    shippingAddress {
      fullName
      phone
      streetAddress
      city
      emirate
      postalCode
      country
    }
    items {
      id
      quantity
      unitPrice
      subtotal
      product {
        id
        name
        sku
      }
    }
    statusHistory {
      status
      timestamp
      notes
    }
  }
}
